history.text: Monsters University 2013, Comedy by Animation
Did you see the movie?
yes a long time ago
im surprised that it got a 79%
I suppose you're right it did come out in 2013
You didn't like it?
yes it was a good movie
how about you did you like it
oh okay, yeah I liked it, Billy Crystal and John Goodman were great
the responses seem very dramatic for a comedy
CinemaScore was an A but the Metacritic was 65/100, pretty diverse ratings
I was thinking the same thing, a childrens comedy none the less
The Roar Omega Roar, great frat
yes! the summery is similar to a lot of other movies i noticing
yeah but Billy Crystal fit the role of Mike very well.
not sure of anything else that he was in?
I really couldn't imagine him as a scarer
a lot of movies, something to look up later.
for sure
I forgot that Sulley tampered with the machine to let Mike win the sim room
such a sad moment
the key notes are talking about the scene when they join the scare games to get restated but i forgot that they even got kicked out of school
yeah it was end of the scare games that Sulley tampered with the machine to let Mike win
he moved the simulation room to the easiest setting
but it goes to show some people can and some teach
aint that the truth
Oozma Kappa, man these writers weren't very creative lol
I kind of see the critics point of views now with some of the details, but it was a kids movie for the most part
thats true in a lot of things though
you're right,
True up and comer, good guys win in the end, they get hired into the mail room
and then well the rest is history, they make it to the scare floor which brings us back to the first movie (best one of the series)

yes the original
 is always better
This isn't really a movie I'll go rush out to see again to be honest, it had its moments and the characters are good but the writing was sub par
true i think this is the movie you wait till its on dvd or blu ray to see it
if its on TV when i am flipping through channels on a lazy day I'd give it a watch though.
there isnt a real reason to go to the theater
unless with a child
and I don't think it will be in the theatres again unless its at one of the bargain places
Some funny scenes but overall a "meh" rating from me but no harsh criticisms like others

yes the sequel
 was not needed in my opinion
this was the the third in the series I beleive, but anyway it was nice talking with you

uid2response.feedback: We struggled a bit since neither of us found the movie that enjoyable but both had seen it. I attempted to try and get some additional discussions but only received some short handed responses.
